name: SokobanWorld
description:
Hi, welcome to Sokoban World! This is a prototype of our  thesis game. 

Unity in mac is broken. Sorry for no Mac Build!

We're planning to make a standalone RPG game (not sure). And this version support 2 players (just for better testing and experimenting).

Controls: 

Player 1: [WASD] to move,  [Space] to lift and throw. Double click move buttons to kick

Player 2: ↑↓←→ arrow buttons to move, [Return] to lift and throw. Double click move buttons to kick

Kicked or flying boxes can deal damage to players.

Some play videos and devLogs are listed below.

We little cute boxmen want to throw boxes on the top of walls!

No idea what to do in this game! We're just hanging around in this world and doing nothing!

This is our world editor, efficient.

And our BoxMan!

The Testing Mode

The Chess Mode
